page.description: Deletes the specified director and all of its contents, including other directories and their contents.

argument.name: dirPath
argument.description: The path to the directory to remove. *[js:dirPath]* must end with a "/". EG, "path/to/directory/".

argument.name: onRemoveSuccess
argument.description: A Javascript function that is called if the deleting the directory is a success.

argument.name: onError
argument.description: A Javascript function that is called if an error occurs when trying to recursively delete the directory.
